name: google-vision-models
description: Google Vision Models - Access via API to Face Detection, Label Detection, Logo Detection, Object Detection, Text Detection, Web Detection as Dataloop Models.

input.name: items
input.description: List of items to run inference on

output.name: items
output.description: The same input images for prediction.

functions.name: predict_dataset
functions.description: Function to run Google Vision API inference on a dataset

models.name: explicit_content_detection
models.description: SafeSearch Detection detects explicit content such as adult content or violent content within an image. This feature uses five categories (adult, spoof, medical, violence, and racy) and returns the likelihood that each is present in a given image. Requires GCS Integration in Dataloop, Refer to Data Governance for more information

models.name: face-detection
models.description: Face Detection detects multiple faces within an image along with the associated key facial attributes such as emotional state or wearing head wear.  Requires GCS Integration in Dataloop, Refer to Data Governance for more information

models.name: label-detection
models.description: Label Detection can detect and extract information about entities in an image, across a broad group of categories.  Requires GCS Integration in Dataloop, Refer to Data Governance for more information

models.name: logo-detection
models.description: Logo Detection detects popular product logos within an image.  Requires GCS Integration in Dataloop, Refer to Data Governance for more information

models.name: object-detection
models.description: The Vision API can detect and extract multiple objects in an image with Object Localization.  Requires GCS Integration in Dataloop, Refer to Data Governance for more information

models.name: text-detection
models.description: The Vision API can detect and extract text from images.  Requires GCS Integration in Dataloop, Refer to Data Governance for more information

models.name: web-detection
models.description: Web Detection detects Web references to an image. Requires GCS Integration in Dataloop, Refer to Data Governance for more information
